title: The Inheritance
description: Two cousins, Ryan Dallion and Micki Foster, inherit an antiques shop from their uncle.

title: The Poison Pen
description: Ryan and Micki disguise themselves as monks to retrieve a mysterious pen kept in an ancient monastery.

title: Cupid's Quiver
description: Micki, Ryan and Jack must track down an evil statue that causes men to kill the women they love.

title: A Cup of Time
description: A mysterious teacup gives an elderly woman the power of eternal youth -- at a cost.

title: Hellowe'en
description: On Halloween night, Micki and Ryan are visited by the ghost of their late uncle, who has returned from the underworld.

title: The Great Montarro
description: Micki and Ryan track down a box used to perform a dangerous magic trick.

title: Doctor Jack
description: Micki, Ryan and Jack track down a cursed scalpel that has found its way into the hands of a talented surgeon.

title: Shadow Boxer
description: Micki and Ryan investigate the murder of a gym owner and realize that a mysterious pair of boxing gloves may be to blame.

title: Root of All Evil
description: Ryan and Micki search for a cursed mulcher which is the murder weapon of choice for a gardener's assistant.

title: Tales of the Undead
description: Ryan believes that a half-man, half-monster comic-book hero has come to life and is responsible for the murder of a shopkeeper.

title: Scarecrow
description: Micki and Ryan search for a cursed scarecrow that may be responsible for murder.

title: Faith Healer
description: An unscrupulous faith healer discovers a powerful glove that turns him into a killer.

title: The Baron's Bride
description: Micki and Ryan are transported to 19th-century London, where they investigate a murder.

title: Bedazzled
description: Micki is terrorized by a man looking for a magic lantern that has the power to find buried treasure.

title: Vanity's Mirror
description: A girl finds a compact mirror that has the power to make others adore her and uses the cursed object to seek revenge against her sister.

title: Tattoo
description: A compulsive gambler discovers a way to increase his winnings, but the method proves to be deadly.

title: The Electrocutioner
description: A dentist uses a cursed electric chair to seek revenge against those who wronged him.

title: Brain Drain
description: A man seeks to increase his intelligence and become a world-renowned scientist, but his quest results in the deaths of other researchers.

title: The Quilt of Hathor
description: Micki and Ryan pose as members of a religious sect to track down a patchwork quilt that is thought to have deadly powers.

title: The Quilt of Hathor: The Awakening
description: Ryan learns that a woman is using a deadly quilt to murder members of a religious sect, but the tightly-knit group blames him for the killings.

title: Double Exposure
description: Ryan suspects a news anchor of murder, but the man has a solid alibi that makes it nearly impossible to prove he is the culprit.

title: The Pirate's Promise
description: Micki and Ryan travel to a seaside village to retrieve a cursed foghorn that is being used by a town resident to summon the ghost of a vengeful pirate.

title: Badge of Honor
description: A police officer uses a deadly sheriff's badge to seek revenge against a mob boss for the murder of his wife.

title: Pipe Dream
description: A frustrated dreamer turns to the supernatural to achieve success, using an ornate pipe to eliminate anyone who gets in his way.

title: What a Mother Wouldn't Do
description: A woman is driven to murder when her newborn's cursed cradle seeks revenge.

title: Bottle of Dreams
description: Jack tries to rescue Ryan and Micki when they're locked in a vault with a cursed urn that conjures up torturous nightmares.

title: Doorway to Hell
description: A cracked mirror threatens to suck Micki and Ryan into the underworld.

title: The Voodoo Mambo
description: The spirit of a dead voodoo priestess strikes out at the ones who supervised her death.

title: And Now the News
description: A psychiatrist secretly accounts her miraculous success rate to a unique antique radio that delivers cures and advice during the nightly news.

title: Tails I Live, Heads You Die
description: A reporter trails a violent cult of devil worshipers calling people back from the dead.

title: Symphony in B#
description: Micki and Ryan investigate a series of murders at a concert hall, only to discover that a violinist who was presumed dead may in fact be alive.

title: Master of Disguise
description: Micki learns beauty is only skin deep after she falls for a mysterious movie star who relies on an antique makeup case.

title: Wax Magic
description: Ryan and Jack are intrigued by a traveling wax museum that boasts an exhibit of axe murderess Lizzie Borden.

title: Read My Lips
description: A ventriloquist's dummy becomes a vessel for evil when it comes to life and demands that its master commit murder.

title: 13 O'Clock
description: Ryan, Micki and Jack track down an antique pocket watch that allows its owner to freeze time.

title: Night Hunger
description: A hot-rod racer uses a cursed necklace to win events by killing his competition and dipping the chain in his victims' blood.

title: The Sweetest Sting
description: Micki, Ryan and Jack pursue an antique beehive containing vampire bees that suck the life out of their victims.

title: The Playhouse
description: Micki, Ryan and Jack travel to a small town where the disappearance of several children is linked to a mysterious toy playhouse.

title: Eye of Death
description: A devious antiques dealer uses a magic lantern to travel back to the Civil War so he can steal artifacts from dead soldiers.

title: Face of Evil
description: A model uses a cursed compact to dispose of anyone who stands in the way of her success, including her doctor and her lover.

title: Better Off Dead
description: Micki is captured by a deranged scientist who uses an antique silver syringe to extract brain fluids from prostitutes.

title: Scarlet Cinema
description: A college student dreams of becoming a werewolf and discovers an antique camera that will turn him into his favorite movie monster.

title: The Mephisto Ring
description: Micki and Ryan race to find an old World Series ring that enables its owner to see gambling results before they happen.

title: A Friend to the End
description: Micki's young nephew befriends the ghost of a boy residing in the local haunted house.

title: The Butcher
description: A disturbed German scientist uses a silver amulet to bring a Nazi colonel back to life in a bid to rebuild the Third Reich and take over the world.

title: The Secret Agenda of Mesmer's Bauble
description: A pendant gives a mild-mannered record store clerk unspeakable powers, which he uses to fulfill his dream of meeting a beautiful rock star.

title: Wedding in Black
description: Micki, Jack and Ryan become suspicious when they each receive mysterious visits from three friends from their past.

title: Wedding Bell Blues
description: Micki waits tables in a seedy bar in an attempt to retrieve a cursed pool cue that enables the owner to win every game.

title: The Maestro
description: Ryan and Micki investigate the apparent suicides of a handful of ballet dancers and soon learn that they may be linked to a rare music box.

title: The Shaman's Apprentice
description: A native American doctor discovers a unique way to cure terminally ill patients, but the price of the treatment is murder.

title: The Prisoner
description: A prisoner is given a jacket that renders him invisible and he walks out of jail to get his revenge on those who betrayed him.

title: Coven of Darkness
description: A witch fights to gain a powerful occult symbol, using a helpless Ryan in the process.

title: The Prophecies
description: Micki and Ryan travel to a French village to help Jack stop a fallen angel from fulfilling six evil prophecies.

title: The Prophecies: Part II
description: Jack tries to stop a fallen angel from fulfilling Lucifer's prophecies, while Ryan becomes possessed by the devil.

title: Crippled Inside
description: A vengeful quadriplegic discovers that she can regain control of her body with the help of a magic wheelchair.

title: Stick It in Your Ear
description: A commercial psychic uses a mystic hearing aid to read the thoughts of his audience.

title: Bad Penny
description: Micki discovers that a deadly item from her past has resurfaced, a satanic coin that can bring the dead back to life.

title: Hate on Your Dial
description: A racist uses a cursed antique car radio to travel back to 1954 and tries to prevent the arrest and death of his father, a member of the KKK.

title: Night Prey
description: A cursed crucifix helps a husband exact revenge on the vampire who stole his bride during their honeymoon in 1969.

title: Femme Fatale
description: A director lures women into his home where they become unwilling players in his movies thanks to a cursed film reel.

title: Mightier Than the Sword
description: Using a cursed pen, a pulp writer transforms himself into an acclaimed novelist who is known for getting inside the minds of serial killers.

title: Year of the Monkey
description: A father uses a potentially fatal test to challenge the loyalty of his children using three magical monkey statues.

title: Epitaph for a Lonely Soul
description: A mortician uses a haunted embalming tool to re-animate the corpse of a woman with whom he was obsessed in life.

title: Midnight Riders
description: History repeats itself when a gang of bikers return from the dead to wreak small-town terror.

title: Repetition
description: A well-known reporter is transformed into a desperate killer after finding a cursed locket in his possession.

title: The Long Road Home
description: Micki and Johnny must use a charm that transfers one person's mind into another's body.

title: My Wife as a Dog
description: A neurotic man uses a cursed dog leash to transform his wife into an obedient and faithful canine.

title: Jack-in-the-Box
description: An angry child avenges her father's senseless death using a cursed toy.

title: Spirit of Television
description: A dying psychic uses the powers of a cursed TV set to push back the hour of her own death.

title: The Tree of Life
description: An obstetrician practicing Druidism utilizes a cursed statue to breed Druid priestesses at her fertility clinic.

title: The Charnel Pit
description: A two-sided painting acts as a portal back to the time of the Marquis de Sade.
